::Zardus/Reptilica/Bloodystrike/DevilDuer::

A shot flies by Deemos, barely missing him and hitting a rock, shattering it. 
Zardus flies into the battle, jetpack burning and guns blazing.

The Alliance commander was holding a plasma launcher in one hand and an 
automatic in the other. He frowns as his shot misses, opening fire on Deemos 
with both guns.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Reptilica growls as Testifier takes the missiles meant for Deemos. Fine, he 
thinks, if this bot wanted to die, so be it.

Reptilica aims at Testifier, firing two missiles.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Seeing Blender and Stronghold down, Bloodystrike laughs, putting away both 
his guns and taking out a missile launcher. He fires two missiles at Deemos, 
while DevilDuer shoots his pistol at Blender and Stronghold, just for thrills.
